articles.description: The M4 iMac is a beautiful object and a good computer, and it’s still the only Mac that comes in actual colors. But otherwise, it’s the same machine as it was in 2023, and it’s substantially the same as it was back in 2021. So who is the M4 iMac for, exactly?
articles.content:
Still beautiful. Still good. Still the wrong form factor for basically everybody.
ByNathan Edwards, a senior reviews editor who's been testing tech since 2007. Previously at Wirecutter and MaximumPC… [+12194 chars]
